matches patterns and builds the token stream. Note that the token stream is invalidated each time Lex is called.

we have an identifier.

note that we treat numerical operators as part of identifers. This makes handling file names easier. If this is undesired, it's up to the parser to error as needed. That means that numerical operators must be split up as well.
